LanguageData.Ammo_83mmSMAW_HEAT.label: реактивна ракета 83мм (Кумулятивний)
LanguageData.Ammo_83mmSMAW_HEAT.description: 83mm rocket designed for the Shoulder-Launched Multipurpose Assault Weapon (SMAW). After being fired a rocket motor kicks in to propel the warhead further.
LanguageData.Ammo_83mmSMAW_HE.label: реактивна ракета 83мм (Фугасний)
LanguageData.Ammo_83mmSMAW_HE.description: 83mm rocket designed for the Shoulder-Launched Multipurpose Assault Weapon (SMAW). After being fired a rocket motor kicks in to propel the warhead further.
LanguageData.Ammo_83mmSMAW_Thermobaric.label: реактивна ракета 83мм (Thermobaric)
LanguageData.Ammo_83mmSMAW_Thermobaric.description: 83mm rocket designed for the Shoulder-Launched Multipurpose Assault Weapon (SMAW). After being fired a rocket motor kicks in to propel the warhead further.
LanguageData.Bullet_83mmSMAW_HEAT.label: 83mm SMAW rocket (Кумулятивний)
LanguageData.Bullet_83mmSMAW_HE.label: 83mm SMAW rocket (Фугасний)
LanguageData.Bullet_83mmSMAW_Thermobaric.label: 83mm SMAW rocket (Thermobaric)
